content:
Could someone point me to the spot where bootstrap produces diffs? E.g. when running UI tests where the output doesn't match:

---- [ui] ui/hygiene/no_implicit_prelude.rs stdout ----
diff of stderr:

-   error: cannot find macro `panic` in this scope
-     --> $DIR/no_implicit_prelude.rs:16:9
+   error: expected item, found `!`
+     --> $DIR/no_implicit_prelude.rs:1:1
Oh, thanks! Somehow I didn't think to look there
